subject: Dreamweaver $59
body:
Losing doesn't eat at me the way it used to. I just get ready for the next play, the next game, the next season.

Because you are a great lord, you believe yourself to be a great genius. You took the trouble to be born, but no more.

People who want the most approval get the least and people who need approval the least get the most.

The great question is not whether you have failed, but whether you are content with failure.

The heart is half a prophet.

Few people can be happy unless they hate some other person, nation, or creed.

The brave and bold persist even against fortune the timid and cowardly rush to despair though fear alone.

Nothing is so firmly believed as that which we least know.

Who so loves believes the impossible.

Be absolutely determined to enjoy what you do.

I wasn't driven into medicine by a social conscience but by rampant curiosity.

Life is largely a matter of expectation.

It is better to be a coward for a minute than dead for the rest of your life.
